[What is the main point?]: The main point of the invention is to provide a ladder attachment that increases the contact area with the work surface, preventing the ladder from slipping or sliding, and avoiding damage to the work surface.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is created to address the problems of instability, slipping, and surface damage caused by typical ladders.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves ladders and the users who climb them for tasks like painting or cleaning exteriors of buildings.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of using the ladder with the attachment occurs during the tasks of climbing and working at heights.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action of using the ladder with the attachment happens at the work surface, whether it's a flat surface or a corner.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a debris-reducing collated nail strip for fastener driving tools, made from a plastic material that adheres to the nails, reducing the amount of debris generated during nail driving.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening due to the adhesion of the plastic material to the nails, which remains on the nail shank as the nail penetrates the substrate, minimizing debris generation.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves fastener manufacturers, construction industry users, and potentially the patent holders or inventors.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of using the invention is happening during the driving of nails into a substrate using fastener driving tools.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in construction sites or any location where fasteners are being driven into a substrate, such as wood, using fastener driving tools.

[What is the main point?]: The invention is a nozzle designed for applying sealants like silicones on various industrial machines and artifacts, offering advantages over current market options.
[Why is it happening?]: The invention aims to address the need for a nozzle that can be used with both manual cartridges and automatic injection machines, providing precise sealant application around rivets and nuts, and reducing the need for hazardous cleaning solvents.
[Who is involved?]: The invention is relevant to manufacturers and users in industries such as aviation, automotive, naval, railway, and robotics.
[When is the action happening?]: The invention was disclosed on October 31, 2012, and relates to devices for applying sealants in various industries.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action of applying sealants using the invention occurs on machines and artifacts in industries like aviation, automotive, naval, railway, and robotics.

[What is the main point?]: The invention relates to a method of multiplexing multiple sensors on a minimum number of wires with minimal energy required from each sensor monitoring system.
[Why is it happening?]: To reduce the amount of wiring and power consumption in mechanical systems that require position or motion sensors, such as internal combustion engines.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves the development of a sensor signal conditioner and remotely located sensor monitoring equipment.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of multiplexing sensors and monitoring their signals is ongoing as part of the operation of the mechanical systems.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the mechanical systems that require position or motion sensors, specifically in the context of internal combustion engines and other similar mechanical systems.

[What is the main point?]: The main point of the invention is to provide a highly efficient, essentially springless (desmodromic), and substantially infinitely variable valve actuator system for use in internal combustion engines, particularly in automobiles, to significantly reduce gas consumption and enhance engine performance.
[Why is it happening?]: The invention aims to address the limitations of the standard cam/spring valve actuation system, which requires high spring loading and limits engine speed, by introducing a desmodromic valve actuation system that can control valve port openness and eliminate the need for springs, thus allowing for higher engine speeds and more efficient gas consumption.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves the automotive industry, particularly manufacturers of internal combustion engines, and potentially the end-users, such as car owners and drivers, who would benefit from improved fuel efficiency and engine performance.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of the invention, which is the implementation of the desmodromic valve actuation system, would occur during the operation of an internal combustion engine in an automobile.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the engine of an automobile, specifically in the valve actuation system of the internal combustion engine.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a versatile aquarium lighting system using LEDs that allows for manual and remote control of different light colors and intensities, with adjustable color temperature output.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening to provide a simple, manually controllable design with a broad range of user functionality in a small footprint for residential aquarium lighting.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves aquarium owners and users who want to enhance the conditions and aesthetics of their aquatic environments.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of using the invention is ongoing as it is a continuation application for aquarium lighting.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in residential settings where aquariums are kept, and potentially under office or kitchen cabinets as per some constructions.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a cooled flow deflection apparatus for a fluid-flow machine that operates at high temperatures, which avoids the disadvantages of known apparatuses by using separate inserts for cooling channels instead of casting them within the blade.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening to provide a simpler, more flexible, and efficiently cooled solution for high-temperature applications like gas turbines.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves engineers and manufacturers in the field of thermal machines and gas turbines.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of implementing this invention is ongoing as it is a continuous process of manufacturing and improving gas turbine blades.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in the manufacturing facilities where gas turbine blades are produced.

[What is the main point?]: The main point of the invention is to provide a system and method for controlling the operation of a fuel delivery system in a vehicle, which can be smoothly switched between automatic and manual control without causing the vehicle to lurch forward or stall.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening in response to the need for improved fuel delivery systems that can automatically control the amount of fuel delivered to a vehicle's engine for better fuel economy and reduced exhaust emissions, while also providing a safe and smooth transition to manual control in case of system malfunctions.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves a control unit, an accelerator pedal, a throttle valve, a stepper motor or DC motor, and a clutch. These components work together to automatically or manually control the fuel delivery system in a vehicle.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of controlling the fuel delivery system can happen automatically based on signals from the accelerator pedal and the throttle valve position, or it can be manually controlled by the vehicle driver when a malfunction is detected or when desired.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the fuel delivery system of a vehicle, specifically in the control unit, throttle valve, and associated components that manage the flow of fuel to the engine.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is to provide a waste fuel burner that emits minimal particulate materials, operates effectively with wet wood, and is self-regulating with fast response times, all while replacing oil and gas burners in various industrial applications.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening to address the inefficiency and pollution issues of conventional wood waste burners, and to provide a cleaner, more efficient, and versatile alternative for burning waste fuels.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves the field of waste fuel burner technology, with potential users being industries that generate waste fuels like wood, such as lime kilns, plywood veneer dryers, lumber dry kilns, and coking operations.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of burning waste fuels with this invention is continuous, as it is designed to respond quickly to changes in demand for heat.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the burner apparatus, which includes primary and secondary combustion chambers, air inlets, and control systems, typically in industrial settings where waste fuels are generated and used for heat.

[What is the main point?]: The invention is an efficient evaporative refrigeration system that separates evaporating water from the cooling air stream using a heat exchanger, avoiding the addition of water vapor to the air and achieving sensible cooling.
[Why is it happening?]: The invention aims to provide a more efficient cooling device due to the need for improved, more efficient cooling devices in light of dwindling energy resources.
[Who is involved?]: The invention is a division of application Ser. No. 601,873, filed on Aug. 4, 1975, and now U.S. Pat. No. 4,023,949.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of the invention, as described in the patent, is the operation of the evaporative refrigeration system.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in the field of air conditioning, specifically in evaporative refrigeration systems.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a fluid pump designed for pumping fluids at high volumetric flow rate and high pressure, which comprises multiple pump heads connected in series, each with an impeller and a drive structure, and a connector system to align and drive the impellers.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening to address the need for improved pumps capable of pumping fluids at high volumetric flow rate and high pressure, particularly for applications like pumping liquid manure from reservoirs in animal husbandry operations.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves the creators of the fluid pump, which can be used by farmers or other entities involved in animal husbandry operations requiring the pumping of liquid manure.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of using the fluid pump occurs when it is operational, typically when it is submerged in a fluid reservoir to pump the fluid through the series of pump heads and out of the final pump head.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action of pumping fluids happens at the location of the fluid reservoir, where the fluid pump is submerged and connected to the reservoir to draw in and pump the fluid.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of an engine compression release brake system that operates on less than all engine cylinders, reducing the number of components and potentially improving engine robustness.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening to address the problem of traditional engine brake systems requiring excess components when not all engine cylinders need to be used for braking, leading to unnecessary complexity and potential reduction in engine robustness.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves engineers and engineers working on engine compression release brake systems.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of implementing this invention is not tied to a specific time frame but is an ongoing process of engine design and development.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in the context of engine design and development, specifically in the creation of engines with modular compression release brakes.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a mounting link assembly between an engine and an attached structure, such as an auxiliary gearbox, that can withstand extreme loads, particularly from blade-off events in gas turbine engines.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is necessary to prevent damage to the gearbox and attached peripheral systems from extreme loads, which conventional gearboxes and connections may not withstand without being overly heavy or requiring additional material.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves engine structures, auxiliary gearboxes, and the mounting link assembly that connects them.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of the mounting link assembly absorbing extreme shocks and preventing damage occurs during events that produce extreme loads, such as blade-off events in gas turbine engines.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in the context of aircraft gas turbine engines and their auxiliary gearboxes, where the mounting link assembly is used to connect the engine to the gearbox.

[What is the main point?]: The main point of the invention is to provide an improved system for attaching arrow points and nocks to arrow shafts, specifically designed for use with unidirectional fiber reinforced shafts, and to balance arrow shafts without the shortcomings of prior art methods.
[Why is it happening?]: The invention addresses issues such as stress on the shaft's internal threads, the tendency of hollow tubes to split, dirt entering the shaft, and the need for adjustable weight for perfect balance.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves archery equipment manufacturers, archers, and potentially arrow shaft and point/nock manufacturers.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of using the invention occurs during the preparation and customization of archery equipment, specifically when attaching arrow points and nocks to arrow shafts.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in the context of archery equipment manufacturing and customization, likely in a workshop or production facility where such equipment is assembled.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of an electronically controlled pyrotechnic sound and flash simulator for small arms training, which is cost-effective, realistic, and does not require weapon modification.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening to provide a realistic simulation of small arms fire noise and flash for training purposes without the high cost of using live ammunition or the dangers of pressurized ignition chambers.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves military forces and combat troops who require realistic training conditions.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of using the simulator is during small arms training sessions.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within a firing unit that can be inserted into a weapon, specifically an M16 rifle, for training purposes.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is to provide an air intake device for an internal combustion engine that improves engine performance by optimizing the dynamic effect and reducing air intake noise.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening to enhance engine performance and reduce noise by utilizing a tank and two interconnected pipes with different cross-sectional areas, controlled by a valve actuated by engine operating conditions.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves engineers, manufacturers, and potentially automotive industry professionals interested in improving internal combustion engine performance and noise reduction.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of the valve opening or closing is based on engine speed and load conditions, typically occurring during engine operation.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the air intake system of an internal combustion engine, specifically at the air cleaner, intake tube, tank, and intake manifold.

[What is the main point?]: The invention provides a mounting bracket assembly for easy and one-person installation of speakers or other equipment on various surfaces, including poles, walls, and columns.
[Why is it happening?]: The invention aims to address the limitations of traditional pipe clamps, which require different clamps for different pipe sizes and often need two people for installation.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves a stationary bracket mounted on a surface and an adjustable bracket attached to the object to be mounted, allowing for easy and one-person installation.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of mounting the object using the invention occurs after the adjustable bracket is connected to the stationary bracket and secured with screws.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action of mounting the object using the invention takes place on various surfaces, including poles, walls, and columns.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of an efficient, clean burning burner and a system for removably attaching heat utilizing appliances to it.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening to optimize efficiency of a burner, limit unburned fuel emissions, and provide modular heat utilizing appliances for diverse applications.
[Who is involved?]: The inventors and potentially users of the modular heat utilizing appliances are involved.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of using the burner and modular heat utilizing appliances is not time-specific, as it is a continuous system.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening wherever the burner and modular heat utilizing appliances are installed and used, likely in homes or commercial settings for cooking, heating, and other applications.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is to provide an ignition and cooling system combination that maintains efficient combustion while improving cooling characteristics to reduce the possibility of structural failure of the engine's housing.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening due to the need for better design to limit thermal distortion and improve cooling in rotary internal combustion engines, particularly around the spark plug bosses.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves rotary internal combustion engines, spark plugs, and the cooling system within the engine housing.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of implementing this invention is ongoing as it aims to improve the design of rotary internal combustion engines.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the engine housing of a rotary internal combustion engine, specifically around the spark plug bosses and the cooling system.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a method that uses control valve positions as feedback to minimize flow disturbance caused by the closing and reopening of a turbine control valve during periodic operational testing.
[Why is it happening?]: This method is necessary to minimize steam boiler pressure changes or turbine power changes during turbine control valve operational safety test stroking.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves turbines, control valves, and the process of periodic operational testing.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of using this method occurs during periodic operational testing of turbines.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the turbine system, specifically during the testing phase of the control valves.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a mixing valve for an aircraft cleaning apparatus that allows continuous analog control of the proportional quantities of soap solution and water, ranging from 0% soap solution to 100% water, and vice versa.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening to provide a stand-alone cleaning apparatus that allows multiple users to control the strength of the cleaning solution without disrupting each other, with each user having complete control over the solution's concentration.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves users of the cleaning apparatus, airline employees who perform aircraft cleaning tasks, and potentially manufacturers of the cleaning apparatus.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of using the cleaning apparatus happens during the yearly extensive cleaning of aircraft by airline employees.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in the commercial airline industry, specifically in the context of cleaning commercial aircraft.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is to propose a method and arrangement for compressing and cooling gas in a compressor station for a gas pipeline, particularly in permanent frost areas, that substantially reduces required investments and operation risks compared to conventional methods.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening due to the challenges of transporting natural gas over long distances in cold areas where traditional cooling methods are inefficient and costly during warmer months.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves the use of compressors, heat exchangers, valves, and control units in a compressor station, with an electronic control system managing the process.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of compressing and cooling the gas occurs during the operation of the compressor station, with different configurations for summer and winter operations.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening at a compressor station along a gas pipeline, with specific configurations for summer and winter operations as illustrated in the provided drawings.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of kinematic mounts with novel damping features to protect instruments from potentially damaging flight loads.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening due to the need for spacecraft structures to reduce weight while maintaining functionality, which requires advanced lightweight composite materials that lack inherent damping characteristics, leading to high vibration levels that can compromise instrument functionality.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves the development of kinematic mounts with damping features to support precision instruments and sensors in space applications.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of implementing these kinematic mounts is ongoing, as efforts are made to incorporate them into spacecraft structures to improve instrument stability and performance during launch.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in the context of spacecraft design and development, specifically in the design and testing of kinematic mounts for space-based applications.

[What is the main point?] The main point is the invention of a novel and improved oil shear type clutch unit for large size power transmission requirements, capable of applying strong coupling forces while maintaining high control accuracy and minimizing residual drag.
[Why is it happening?] It is happening to overcome the disadvantages of previously known constructions, especially for large size power transmission requirements.
[Who is involved?] The inventor, who has previously patented related technologies, is involved in developing this improved clutch unit.
[When is the action happening?] The action of developing and patenting this clutch unit occurred on November 9, 1977, and the patent was later granted on April 11, 1979.
[Where is the action happening?] The action is happening in the field of clutch units for aircraft catapult systems, specifically for applications involving high horsepower and large size requirements.

[What is the main point?]: The main point of this invention is to create an internal combustion engine system that significantly lowers the temperature of exhaust gases and water vapor, allowing for the elimination of a radiator and achieving high thermal-to-mechanical efficiency.
[Why is it happening?]: This is happening to maximize the useful energy output of the engine by capturing and reusing heat energy, reducing heat loss to the environment, and minimizing exhaust temperatures.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves engine components such as combustion and expansion cylinders, pistons, valves, water injection systems, and gearing mechanisms.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of the engine operating, including combustion, expansion, and exhaust processes, happens during the engine's power cycles.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the engine system, which includes various cylinders, water injection lines, cooling jackets, and gearing mechanisms, as depicted in the accompanying figures.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a fabrication process for steel plates that eliminates the formation of intermetallic areas within welded assemblies, which are sources of rupture, while ensuring good corrosion resistance and ductility.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is necessary to address the difficulties encountered when welding coated steel blanks, where the initial surface pre-coating is transferred into the molten area created by welding, leading to the formation of intermetallic areas that reduce the overall deformability of the welded joints after heat treatment.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves the use of steel plates with a pre-coat consisting of an intermetallic alloy layer and a metal alloy layer, which are processed through various methods such as brushing or laser ablation to remove the metal alloy layer, followed by butt-welding, heat treatment, and deformation to produce parts with desired mechanical characteristics and corrosion resistance.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of fabricating the parts happens after the steel plates are prepared with the specified pre-coat and metal alloy layers, which are then processed through the invention's methods to remove the metal alloy layer, welded, heat-treated, and deformed to achieve the final part with the desired properties.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action of fabricating the parts is taking place in a manufacturing setting, likely within an automotive or metalworking facility, where the steel plates are processed through the described methods to produce the final parts.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a novel Supervisory Control And Data Acquisition (SCADA) remote control system for a mobile structure that optimally recovers energy from severe weather patterns, specifically offshore energy recovery systems.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening due to the need for a system that remotely controls the operation and navigation of a mobile structure for cost-effective energy extraction from severe weather patterns, while minimizing risks to human life.
[Who is involved?]: The system involves a remote control system, a mobile structure for energy recovery, a central service facility, and a human operator for optional interaction and decision-making.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of the system is ongoing, as it continuously tracks the position and velocity of the mobile structure, gathers weather data, and optimizes energy extraction efficiency.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in an offshore environment, where the mobile structure navigates and extracts energy from severe weather patterns.

[What is the main point?]: The invention relates to a rolling body guide cage manufactured with a ring element composed of at least two flat material ring segments joined in the circumferential direction and connected via welding, which reduces production costs and waste material.
[Why is it happening?]: To address the disadvantages of the known prior art, such as large amounts of waste material generated during manufacture and high production costs.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves the manufacturing of rolling body guide cages, potentially for use in ball bearings and axial bearings.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of manufacturing the rolling body guide cage occurs during the production process, specifically in a forming step that precedes plastic forming.
[Where is the action happening?]: The manufacturing process takes place in a facility equipped for forming and welding operations, using sheet metal materials and tools like punching dies and rotary plates.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of methods and systems for obtaining and processing information related to customer service locations in telecommunications, using global satellite positioning to improve customer service response times.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening to address the need for efficient and effective customer service in the telecommunications industry, where accurate knowledge of customer service locations is crucial for timely and effective service provision.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves service technicians, technician servers, global positioning satellite systems, dispatch systems, address guide systems, customer records systems, and mapping systems.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of obtaining and processing customer service location information occurs when a service technician visits a customer service location and when service technicians are dispatched between customer service locations.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in telecommunications service locations and potentially remotely, through wireless connections and computer-readable media.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a system for compensating electromagnetic interfering fields, which can handle both homogeneous and inhomogeneous magnetic fields, and includes two real triaxial magnetic field sensors, three pairs of compensation coils, and a control unit with a digital processor.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is necessary to address the challenges of compensating electromagnetic interfering fields, especially when the interfering field is inhomogeneous, and when two magnetic field compensation systems are used in close proximity, leading to undesired feedback effects.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves the use of two real triaxial magnetic field sensors, three pairs of compensation coils, and a control unit with a digital processor, such as a Digital Signal Processor (DSP) or a field programmable gate array (FPGA).
[When is the action happening?]: The action of compensating electromagnetic interfering fields occurs when the system is operational, and the magnetic field to be compensated is present.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action of compensating electromagnetic interfering fields happens within the system, which is designed to protect an object against the effects of the interfering field. The system can be used in various applications, such as imaging systems using magnetic fields, like scanning electron microscopes (SEM).

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a method for improving CARS microscopy by introducing resonance sites into a sample using bioorthogonal reactions, enhancing specificity and scattering cross section.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening to address the limitations of conventional CARS microscopy, such as the need for resonance sites in the sample and the presence of a non-resonant background.
[Who is involved?]: The method involves a sample derived from a biological source, a bioorthogonal reaction, and a CARS microscope.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of introducing resonance sites into the sample and investigating it using CARS microscopy occurs after the bioorthogonal reaction is carried out.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in a laboratory setting where the sample is prepared, the bioorthogonal reaction is performed, and the CARS microscopy investigation takes place.

[What is the main point?]: The invention provides a system for automatically assessing radiation therapy segmentations to compare the quality of segmentations from different sources, which is useful for training, evaluation, and product evaluation purposes.
[Why is it happening?]: To take advantage of the improved accuracy in dose placement offered by optimized radiation planning and delivery systems, and to ensure the quality of segmentations used in radiation therapy.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves clinicians, autosegmentation programs, and electronic files containing segmentation data.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of comparing segmentations can occur during the training of clinicians, periodic quality assurance testing of autosegmentation routines, and evaluation of autosegmentation systems before purchase or clinical application.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within a computer system that receives electronic segmentation files and compares them to generate volume models, identify common, missing, and extra volume elements, and provide a metric method for evaluating the conformance between segmentations.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a technique to accelerate the effective subtraction operation in a floating point unit by using a difference between a subset of signals of the operand exponent arguments.
[Why is it happening?]: This acceleration is necessary because the execution of floating point addition and subtraction operations in the floating point format is more complex and time-consuming than in the standard data format due to the need to align fractions and potentially normalize the result.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves Sridhar Samudrala, Victor Peng, Nachum M. Gavrielov, Vijay Maheshwari, and the assignee of the present application.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of accelerating the effective subtraction operation occurs during the execution of floating point operations in a data processing system.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the data processing system's floating point unit, specifically in the apparatus and method for executing floating point operations.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a method and system for tracking specimens acquired from patients in medical facilities, which reduces or avoids mislabeling of specimen vials.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening due to the common problem of mislabeling errors in hospitals, which poses medical risks and potential liabilities.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves medical professionals, such as doctors and nurses, as well as patients who wear identification bands, and specimen-takers who use badges.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of collecting and tracking specimens happens after a medical professional places an order to draw a specimen from a patient, and includes steps like verifying patient identity, labeling specimen vials, and ensuring the specimen is correctly placed in the designated container.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in a medical facility, such as a hospital, where specimens are collected and tracked.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a voice-activated distance measuring device that provides verbal information to users, such as golfers, about distances and other golf course parameters.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening to address the limitations of existing range finding devices that require manual requests and only provide visual displays, which can be cumbersome for users.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves voice recognition technology, GPS technology, and potentially other users like hikers, surveyors, hunters, scuba divers, and golfers.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of using the device occurs when a user gives voice commands or inputs data, such as the club selected for a shot.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within a device that can be incorporated into headgear like a golf hat or visor, and potentially other portable devices.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a design rule checking system and method that accurately reports appropriate errors for appropriate regions in a system that includes two different kinds of circuits, such as memory and logic, in semiconductor integrated circuit design.
[Why is it happening?]: This development is happening due to the unique challenges presented by systems-on-chip (SOC) designs, which combine memory and logic circuits that have different sizing, performance, and scaling issues when embodied in silicon.
[Who is involved?]: Integrated circuit designers, semiconductor foundries, IC design suppliers, and foundry field support engineers are involved in the process.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of implementing this invention is ongoing, as it is a continuous process in the semiconductor industry.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in semiconductor design and verification labs, as well as in the semiconductor industry at large, including companies that specialize in rendering third-party designs into silicon.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a waveguide hologram (WGH) illuminator that provides improved, controlled illumination of objects, including holograms and spatial light modulators (SLMs), with high diffraction efficiency and minimal stray light.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening due to the discovery that thin substrate waveguides can be used to provide controlled illumination of objects, which is particularly useful for situations requiring specific illumination, such as holograms and SLMs.
[Who is involved?]: The inventors of the waveguide hologram illuminator, the Rome Air Development Center, Department of the Air Force, and those of skill in the art.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of filing the U.S. Patent application Ser. No. 07/790,516 occurred on November 12, 1991.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in the field of optical illumination systems, specifically for applications involving display holograms and spatial light modulators.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a novel, economical, and reliable method and apparatus for non-destructive testing of dynamoelectric machine rotors, which provides automatic pass/fail determinations and measures resistance, reactance, and effective skew of the rotors.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is developed to address the need for economical and reliable testing of squirrel cage rotors in induction motors to detect defects, evaluate manufacturing processes, and maintain high quality control without the need for destructive testing methods.
[Who is involved?]: The assignee of the present invention, who has developed this method and apparatus for testing dynamoelectric machine rotors.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of testing dynamoelectric machine rotors using this method and apparatus can be performed at any time when a rotor needs to be tested before assembly with a stator to form a complete machine.
[Where is the action happening?]: The testing action is happening in a laboratory or industrial setting where dynamoelectric machines are manufactured or maintained.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is to provide a method that allows a managed library to access native resources of an operating system securely, while denying managed applications access unless authorized by a digital certificate.
[Why is it happening?]: This is happening to enhance security on mobile devices by controlling access to native resources and ensuring that only trusted code can execute, especially when third-party applications are involved.
[Who is involved?]: The entities involved include mobile device providers, application developers, and possibly third-party application developers.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of granting or denying access to native resources occurs when a managed application requests access through a managed library, which is then validated by a manager using digital certificates.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the computing environment of a mobile device, specifically when the device is powered on and a user decides to execute a managed application.

[What is the main point?] The main point is the invention of an improved identification card that incorporates an internal antenna and integrated circuit chip, protected by two relatively shock-absorbing layers, within a structure of rigid outer layers.
[Why is it happening?] This invention aims to address the issues of damage to electronic components in traditional smart cards and the high production costs associated with molding processes.
[Who is involved?] The inventors of the improved identification card, as well as manufacturers and users of identification cards.
[When is the action happening?] The action of creating the improved identification card is described in the context of the patent application process and the manufacturing process.
[Where is the action happening?] The action is happening in a manufacturing setting where the identification card components are assembled and laminated.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is to implement a queue in a memory, specifically a FIFO-type queue, in a way that reduces the amount of required copying in a functional structure, which is termed "copy-on-write".
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening to improve the efficiency of updating in functional memories, where updates are made by copying the path from the root to the point of updating, rather than directly in the original data.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves memory structures and data units (records) within a memory system.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of implementing the queue and its updates happens whenever a record is added or deleted from the queue in a functional memory environment.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the memory system, specifically in the tree-shaped data structure and the header node that manage the FIFO queue.

[What is the main point?] The main point is to provide practical methods to build embedded EPROM devices using existing IC manufacture technologies.
[Why is it happening?] It is happening because current art EPROM devices cannot be manufactured using current art DRAM manufacture technologies, and it is desirable to have EPROM devices that can be manufactured by standard logic technologies without requiring high voltages for operations.
[Who is involved?] The inventors and the semiconductor industry are involved in developing and implementing the invention.
[When is the action happening?] The action is happening now, as the invention is a proposed solution to existing challenges in the semiconductor industry.
[Where is the action happening?] The action is happening in the realm of integrated circuit (IC) technologies and semiconductor manufacturing processes.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is an invention that provides a method for easily and accurately determining the optimum value of feedback gain for feedback control systems, which is applicable to various types of control systems and irrespective of the kind of the subject of control.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening because feedback control systems, such as those used in automatic guidance vehicles, require the proper values of feedback gains (P, I, and D) for stable, accurate, and responsive control. Determining these gains can be challenging and time-consuming using traditional methods.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves automatic guidance vehicles (AGVs), control systems, central processors, sensors, and feedback gain storage and controllers.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of determining the optimum feedback gain values happens during the operation of the AGV, as the vehicle runs along a predetermined course.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the control system of the AGV, specifically in the central processor that executes the feedback gain determination method.

[What is the main point?] The main point is the invention of a zoom lens that offers a large relative aperture, high zoom ratio, and standard image angle at the wide angle end, while reducing the size of the entire lens system and preserving high optical performance throughout the zooming range.
[Why is it happening?] This invention is happening due to the demand for zoom lenses that can increase the relative aperture and zoom range without increasing the bulk and size, which is particularly important for video cameras with low sensitivity image pickup elements.
[Who is involved?] The invention involves optical engineers and designers who are working on improving zoom lens technology for photographic and video cameras.
[When is the action happening?] The action of developing this zoom lens technology is ongoing, as indicated by the continuous improvement and miniaturization of video cameras and the need for better zoom lenses.
[Where is the action happening?] The action is happening in the field of optical engineering and camera manufacturing, where advancements in lens design are being made to meet the demands of modern photography and videography.

[What is the main point?]: The invention aims to provide a method and device for detecting elementary particles that can simultaneously detect individual particles and integrate signals, overcoming the limitations of prior art where such simultaneous detection was not possible.
[Why is it happening?]: The invention addresses the need for a device that can detect individual particles and integrate signals without prior knowledge of expected signal rates, improving the noise/signal ratio and simplifying the detection of small-size signals.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves the development of a detector and associated electronics for detecting elementary particles like protons, ions, electrons, neutrons, and photons.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of detecting elementary particles using the invention's method and device occurs during scientific examinations, medical diagnostics, imaging processes, and electrical power engineering applications.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action of detecting elementary particles using the invention's method and device takes place in laboratories, particle accelerators, reactor installations, diagnostic devices, and potentially in other environments where such detection is required.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of an improved automatic apparatus for spin checking driven disc assemblies in clutches, which operates without manual involvement and provides an external indication of the test results.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening to address the need for a more efficient, automatic, and user-friendly spin checking apparatus for driven disc assemblies in clutches, which are essential components in vehicles for connecting the engine's rotational power to the transmission.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves automotive manufacturers, vehicle maintenance technicians, and potentially the drivers who rely on the proper functioning of clutches in their vehicles.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of spin checking a driven disc assembly using this apparatus happens during the quality control process in automotive manufacturing or repair shops, ensuring the clutches are within specified tolerances before they are installed in vehicles.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action of spin checking the driven disc assembly takes place within a controlled testing environment, specifically in the automatic spin checking apparatus as described in the invention.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a method for estimating a person's age from a face image using a contourlet appearance model (CAM) and machine learning techniques.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening due to the increasing demand for accurate, efficient, uncooperative, and cost-effective solutions for face age-estimation in various real-world scenarios, such as automated control and surveillance systems, businesses requiring age verification, and homeland security technologies.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves researchers, government-supported Army Research Office grants, and potentially any computing device capable of executing the face age-estimation method.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of estimating a person's age from a face image using the contourlet appearance model and machine learning techniques can occur in real-time as the image is received and processed by the face age-estimation system.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within a computing system that implements the face age-estimation method, which can range from a self-contained device like a smartphone or desktop computer to a network of multiple devices.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a matrix display device that simultaneously displays two merged images, preserving the definition of the higher-definition image.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention aims to overcome the drawbacks of previous devices that degraded the definition of the merged image when displaying two images of different definitions on a polychrome screen.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves a matrix display device with a controller and a matrix of pixels organized in identical arrangements.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of displaying the merged images happens when the controller applies the appropriate light intensity signals to the pixels of the matrix display device.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the matrix display device, which can be based on various technologies like OLED, LED, or LCD.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a mobile identification transmitter for motor vehicles that allows keyless activation of the vehicle's security system and can perform payment actions without manual operation of the transmitter.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention addresses the need for a mobile identification transmitter with enhanced functionality, a simple design, and the ability to carry out both security system activation and payment actions conveniently.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves a mobile identification transmitter, a payment element, a carrier, and a security system of a motor vehicle.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of activating the security system and performing payment actions can happen at any time when the user carries the mobile identification transmitter.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the housing of the mobile identification transmitter, and it can also occur at a point of sale (POS) when the payment element is used for cashless payment transactions.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is to address the issue of inconsistent and darker image quality in imaging operations due to the decrease in tribo charge of toner when an imaging device is inactive for a long period of time.
[Why is it happening?]: The tribo charge of toner decreases when the imaging device is inactive, affecting the image quality upon waking up from sleep mode.
[Who is involved?]: The imaging device, toner, tribo charge sensor, and a controller are involved in monitoring and adjusting the toner charge.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of charging the toner to a predetermined level based on the determined period of inactivity occurs when the machine wakes up from sleep mode.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within the imaging device, specifically in the toner charging system and developer station.

[What is the main point?]: The main point of the invention is to provide a recording/reproducing apparatus that allows precise and independent control of bias currents for multiple magneto resistive (MR) heads mounted on a rotary drum, enabling high-density recording/reproducing with high precision.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is necessary to address the challenges of increasing the number of MR heads on a rotary drum for higher capacity and transfer rate, while maintaining precision in bias current control and minimizing the complexity of control signal transmission.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves a recording/reproducing unit, a control data generator, and a transmitting unit, along with MR heads, recording heads, and integrated circuits.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of controlling the MR heads and recording heads occurs during the recording and reproduction processes, specifically at the time of head switching.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within a rotary magnetic head type apparatus, which includes a stationary drum side and a rotary drum side, as well as various circuits and transformers for power, control, and signal transmission.

[What is the main point?]: The main point of the invention is to improve the ease and accuracy of locating and tracing one concealed, elongated, conductive, adjacent object, such as a buried pipe or cable, in the presence of an adjacent object.
[Why is it happening?]: This improvement is happening due to the invention's system and method that produce two distinct output signal nulls over respective cables when both cables are present, making it possible to locate and trace one of the cables more easily and accurately than with prior art systems.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves a system comprising a transmitter and a receiver, with the transmitter inducing distinguishable alternating currents in the objects and the receiver sensing the magnetic fields associated with these currents.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of locating and tracing the cables happens when the receiver is moved back and forth across the ground, sensing the magnetic fields produced by the currents in the cables.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in the location where the cables are buried, and the transmitter and receiver are used to detect and trace the cables from the surface.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of an apparatus for interfacing a speaker phone with a telephone network to provide hands-free automatic answering and communication, with a timer for controlling the call duration and a bypass switch for extending the call.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention aims to simplify and enhance hands-free communication for individuals who need it, such as the physically handicapped or those whose tasks require the use of both hands, by providing a portable, easily connectable, automatic answering service with minimal circuitry, cost, and complexity.
[Who is involved?]: The inventive entities involved are the assignee of the instant invention and another inventive entity, each holding claims to different embodiments of the invention.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of interfacing the speaker phone with the telephone network and providing hands-free automatic answering and communication occurs upon the actuation of a selector switch.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in connection with a private telephone line or switchboard extension, with the apparatus being connected to a telephone wall jack for interfacing with the telephone network.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a system for reducing or eliminating undersea optical repeaters in a trunk and branch ring network by replacing repeaters with remotely pumped optical amplifiers and remotely supplying energy to those amplifiers over the same branch cables that also distribute communications signals.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening to reduce the number of undersea optical repeaters required, which are costly, and to develop a more reliable undersea lightwave system that provides multipoint-to-multipoint connectivity, especially in the event of an undersea cable cut.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves telecommunications hubs, branching units, cable stations, and optical amplifiers, all of which are components of an undersea optical fiber communications ring network.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of implementing this invention is not time-specific; it is a continuous process for maintaining and optimizing undersea lightwave systems.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening within undersea optical fiber communications ring networks, specifically in the context of trunk and branch ring structures.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a cover plate device for wall-mounted electrical wiring devices that hides fasteners, is easily installed or removed, and can accommodate non-flat walls.
[Why is it happening?]: The invention addresses the need for a more aesthetically pleasing and safer method of installing wiring devices in walls by hiding fasteners and providing a finished look without exposed hardware.
[Who is involved?]: The invention involves electrical wiring devices, ganged boxes, attachment plates, and cover plates used in building walls.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of installing the cover plate device occurs after the wiring devices are mounted to the ganged boxes and before the final installation of the cover plate over the devices.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in the walls of buildings where the wiring devices and cover plates are installed.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a solution that automatically informs a speaker to decrease their speaking rate when it likely exceeds a rate that a listener can understand.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention aims to improve understanding between speakers and non-native listeners by automatically detecting when a speaker's rate of speech is too rapid for comprehension and notifying the speaker to slow down.
[Who is involved?]: The speakers and non-native listeners are involved, particularly in situations where the listener's primary language is not the language being spoken.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of automatically notifying the speaker to slow down occurs whenever the speaking rate exceeds the established speaking rate threshold.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action can happen in various communication settings, such as face-to-face conversations, telephone calls, web-based interactions with voice modality, and speaking engagements involving groups of attendees. It can also occur in voice communication over a network connection, where the quality of the network connection is considered.

[What is the main point?] The present invention provides a solution for integrating voice calls with multimedia sessions as a blended call in the packet domain, allowing existing network hardware to support multimedia capabilities.
[Why is it happening?] To prolong the viability of existing network devices and accommodate consumer demand for multimedia services without requiring costly replacements of legacy equipment.
[Who is involved?] The invention involves telephony servers, multimedia servers, client devices (telephone and computer type), and potentially a database server for tracking service capabilities.
[When is the action happening?] The action of handling calls as blended calls occurs when incoming or outgoing calls are received by a telephony server, which then determines if the call should be directed to blender software for integration of voice and multimedia components.
[Where is the action happening?] The action is happening within a packet switched network with SIP-enabled devices, as illustrated in the accompanying drawing figures.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a content synchronization framework that allows any connected device to perform contextual synchronization over various network topologies, using dynamic attributes and file bundles, and is highly scalable, efficient, and adaptable to different contexts and bandwidths.
[Why is it happening?]: This invention is happening to address the limitations of existing data synchronization methods, which lack support for dynamic attributes, logical bundling of data, prioritization of data synchronization, and efficient resumption after connection disruptions.
[Who is involved?]: The involved parties include client devices (e.g., PCs, PDAs), a central reference point (e.g., server or group of servers), network connectivity (e.g., Internet), and optional external partners.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of synchronization happens when a client device sends a synchronization request to the central reference point, which processes the request and returns a response with file bundles. The client device then downloads the bundles in the specified order and updates its local copies.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening between the client device and the central reference point, with the potential involvement of external partners and various network connectivity arrangements.

[What is the main point?]: The present invention provides systems and methods that allow a person, such as a finder of a lost or misplaced object, to anonymously communicate with another, such as the owner of the object.
[Why is it happening?]: To facilitate the return of the object to its owner.
[Who is involved?]: The owner of the tagged object and the finder of the object.
[When is the action happening?]: The action can happen at any time when the object is lost or misplaced and found by someone else.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening online, through a virtual locale such as a website or instant messaging system.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of a foil electron multiplier, which is a new design for electron multipliers used in detectors and spectrometers, offering higher gain efficiency, simpler fabrication, lower cost, larger coverage area, and intrinsic rejection of ion feedback compared to conventional multipliers.
[Why is it happening?]: The invention is happening due to the need for improved electron multipliers in various applications, such as photomultipliers, mass spectrometers, and photonic detectors, where the foil electron multiplier's advantages over traditional designs are significant.
[Who is involved?]: The U.S. Department of Energy, the inventors, and potentially other researchers and manufacturers in the field of electron multipliers and particle detectors are involved in the development and implementation of this invention.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of developing and implementing the foil electron multiplier invention is ongoing, as indicated by the continuous improvement and potential modifications mentioned in the document.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening in a research and development context, likely within laboratories and facilities specializing in electron multipliers and particle detection technologies.

[What is the main point?]: The main point is the invention of the 3-D Phenomenoscope, a system that allows ordinary 2-dimensional motion pictures to be viewed in part as a 3-dimensional experience by utilizing the Pulfrich effect.
[Why is it happening?]: It is happening to overcome the problems and constraints of producing and viewing 3-dimensional motion pictures, which have been a barrier to their wide scale acceptance due to production difficulties, projection requirements, and viewer discomfort.
[Who is involved?]: The inventors of the 3-D Phenomenoscope, as well as motion picture producers, distributors, theaters, and viewers.
[When is the action happening?]: The action of viewing motion pictures with the 3-D Phenomenoscope occurs in real-time as the motion picture is being played.
[Where is the action happening?]: The action is happening wherever motion pictures are viewed, including movie theaters, homes with TVs, Cable TV, and PC monitors.
